title: New client taking must of my CPU use.
body: Whenever I login to the new client my CPU usage jumps up for to the 50's and 90's when I'm just in the client.

replies.body:
I get this too and I'm already using low-spec mode.
Idk what's causing it; can't find it in my processes.

The only time you should really see the most pc usage activity is when you connect to champion select.  Just to help reduce that stress, enabled [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to get rid of the fancy stuff that can cause it.   Test it in a custom and let me know if all that helps.
